T11dhkprviu:2: asataḥ sapakṣān na nivṛttir ity asapakṣa eva nāstīti cet* /
T11dhkprviu:3: neti saiva nivṛtter nirvṛttiḥ asataḥ katham iṣṭā /
T11dhkprviu:6: bhāvapratiṣedhas tu na saṃbhavatīty askhalitaprajño devānāṃpriyo yas tadviṣayaṃ pratiṣedhaṃ necchati /
T11dhkprviu:11: na cāsann ātmā sattāsādhanavṛtteḥ sandigdhaḥ syāt* /
T11dhkprviu:12: na ca pareṇa tathopagata iti // apramāṇād abhyupagamāt tathaiva bhavati /
T11dhkprviu:14: 4: na copagamabalena sapakṣāsapakṣau vyavasthāpya pramāṇapravartanaṃ yuktam* /
T11dhkprviu:24: anyathā kvacid dṛṣṭe 'bhāvasidhāv api syād evādṛṣṭe
T11dhkprviu:26: tathā hy asakalavyaktibhedavyāpino 'py arthāḥ kecit tajjātisaṃbhavino dṛṣṭāḥ pārthivālohalekhyavat*
T11dhkprviu:31: ātmapratiniyame hi tatkāryātmatayā prāṇādīnāṃ nairātmyena saha virodhaḥ
T11dhkprviu:34: astu nāma nirātmakebhyo vyatirekaḥ prāṇādīnāṃ tadbhāve ca nairātmyavyāvṛttiḥ /
